title: How do people describe a song? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are 3 ways how people describe a song which is also the way how they remember the song by lyricsby tuneand by its artist/musicians/people who worked in it many people who give a lot of importance to the lyrics will try to imagine the meaning of the lyrics and and remember it.Many other will hum the tune in their mind and keep on singing it.Rest of the people remember it cz it might be their fav artists or some one who is really notable.There are many other way of describing and remembering the song, but these three are the most
